messages.message:
New Opportunity

Hi Brian, 

My name is Kaitlyn and I am recruiter with TEKsystems here in Phoenix. I see on your profile that you listed that you would like to hear about new opportunities. I wanted to see if you could chat today so I could learn a little more about what you would be interested in and if it aligns with any positions I have currently or coming up. Let me know when would be a good time to connect.

Thanks!

Kaitlyn Soltesz
6025672391 | ksoltesz@teksystems.com
I work with over 90 companies here is Phoenix and have 2 with immediate openings. Is there a time you can speak today and I can let you know?
2 immediate openings for which two companies?
